Despite his aversion to children, Commissaire Laurence becomes their bodyguard, and his secretary Marl\u00e8ne delights at playing mother. The solution to the mystery appears to center around Louison's strange orphanage, an institution well known to journalist Alice Avril, who spent her childhood
